sentences.sContent: Have you taken any relevant postgraduate qualifications?
sentences.sContent_eng: Have you taken any relevant postgraduate qualifications?
sentences.sCn: 你有没有相关的研究生证书？

sentences.sContent: But I have seen a wonderful basketball game between my class and postgraduate class.
sentences.sContent_eng: But I have seen a wonderful basketball game between my class and postgraduate class.
sentences.sCn: 但是我看到了一个精彩的篮球比赛我们班和研究生之间类。

sentences.sContent: But I have seen a wonderful basketball game between my class and postgraduate class.
sentences.sContent_eng: But I have seen a wonderful basketball game between my class and postgraduate class.
sentences.sCn: 但我已经看到了我们班和研究生班之间的一场精彩的篮球比赛。

phrases.pCn: 研究生文凭；研究生文凭课程

trans.tranOther: someone who is studying at a university to get a  master’s degree  or a  phd
